Name: Coptic textile
Description: A fragment of tapestry on a natural linen background. The motif consists of parallel grape vines with birds pecking at the grapes, the colours are red, yellow, green and indigo.Technique: plain weave ground with thicker weft thread. A small border of thinner weft thread in plain weave encloses the tapestry motif which has built up shapes and curved weft.Ends per inch (warp threads): 56, 28 over tapestry.Picks per inch (weft threads): 28 over thick ground, 160 approximately over tapestry.
